javadoc:
Service that provides a Language given a name, and 
 information about the language.

methods.name: getLanguage
methods.comment: Returns the language with the given language ID

params.name: languageID
params.comment: the ID of language to retrieve

throws.comment: if no language can be found for the given ID

return.comment: the Language matching the given ID

methods.name: getDefaultLanguage
methods.comment: Returns the default Language to use for the given processor;

params.name: processor
params.comment: the processor for which to get a language.

throws.comment: if there is no languages at all for the given processor.

methods.name: getLanguageDescription
methods.comment: Get language information for the given language ID.

throws.comment: if there is no language for the given ID.

return.comment: language information for the given language ID.

methods.name: getLanguageDescriptions
getLanguageDescriptions
methods.comment:
Returns all known language descriptions which satisfy the criteria identify by the
 non-null parameters.  A null value implies a don't-care wildcard value.

params.name: processor
params.comment: the processor for which to get a language

return.comment: the language descriptions that fit the parameters

methods.name: getLanguageCompilerSpecPairs
methods.comment:
Returns all known language/compiler spec pairs which satisfy the criteria
 identify by the non-null parameters. A null value implies a don't-care
 wildcard value.  OMITS DEPRECATED LANGUAGES.

methods.javadoc:
Returns all known language/compiler spec pairs which satisfy the criteria
 identify by the non-null parameters. A null value implies a don't-care
 wildcard value.  OMITS DEPRECATED LANGUAGES.
 This uses an ExternalLanguageCompilerSpecQuery rather than a
 LanguageCompilerSpecQuery.
@param query
@return
methods.name: getLanguageCompilerSpecPairs
methods.comment:
Returns all known language/compiler spec pairs which satisfy the criteria
 identify by the non-null parameters. A null value implies a don't-care
 wildcard value.  OMITS DEPRECATED LANGUAGES.
 This uses an ExternalLanguageCompilerSpecQuery rather than a
 LanguageCompilerSpecQuery.

methods.javadoc:
Returns all language Descriptions associated with the given processor.
@param processor the processor for which to retrieve all know language descriptions.
methods.name: getLanguageDescriptions
methods.comment: Returns all language Descriptions associated with the given processor.

params.name: processor
params.comment: the processor for which to retrieve all know language descriptions.

name: LanguageService
comment:
Service that provides a Language given a name, and 
 information about the language.
